import React from 'react' import "./Main.css" const bugObj = [ { id: 1, description: "hello", status: 0 }, { id: 2, description: "hello this is an long deswcription", status: 1 }, { id: 3, description: "hell this is an medium ", status: 1 }, { id: 6, description: "hello", status: 2 } ] const Main = () => { return (
Id
Description
Status
{bugObj.map((bug) => (
{bug.id}
{bug.description}
))}
) } export default Main
